title: demographics
description: Array of all demographic parameters for the profile.

items.title: demographic_parameter
items.description: Object storing a singular demographic parameter.

value_type.description: Type of the parameter value, e.g., 'mean'.

meta:enum.range_lower: lower boundary of the value range
meta:enum.range_upper: upper boundary of the value range

value_numeric.description: Numeric value of the parameter value, e.g., 'mean'.

value_unit.description: Unit of the parameter value, e.g., 'years'.

value_string.description: Non-numeric value of the parameter value.

unit.description: Unit of the parameter value, e.g., 'years'.
